# Enumeration: ParticipationEventType

The types of participation events.

## Table of contents

### Enumeration Members

- [Voting](ParticipationEventType.md#voting)
- [Staking](ParticipationEventType.md#staking)

## Enumeration Members

### Voting

• **Voting** = ``0``

A voting event.

___

### Staking

• **Staking** = ``1``

A staking event.
